channel.title: NEW SPOT FOR NPC's?
channel.description: i got a npc and i want to change where its at is there anyway to do it...if so please some1 gimme the place to search and what to search ty

item.title: NEW SPOT FOR NPC's?
item.dc:creator: @SSG_Fan_XX SSG Fan XX
item.description:
@SSG_Fan_XX wrote:

here is something a little easyer then puting tabs through it like spawn = 555 3132 9746…

spawn = 555		3123	9846	0	0	0	0	0	0	NPC INFO

Read full topic

item.title: NEW SPOT FOR NPC's?
item.dc:creator: @Hockey4lifexx Hockey4lifexx
item.description:
@Hockey4lifexx wrote:

[quote=“lov3_rs_money, post:5, topic:166469”][quote author=Hockey4lifexx link=topic=225693.msg1943822#msg1943822 date=1198282518]

go to the spot where you want it and type ::mypos and tell me the coord x and coord y and right click the npc and tell me its npc id…

i dont got autospawn.cfg i think…

is it a text doc.?
x: 3123
y: 9846

npc id is 555

and i got this npc on my server too just fyi
[/quote]

right autospawn.cfg
copy this EXACTLY
spawn = 555 3132 9846 0 0 0 0 1 Npc Name

hope it helped

Lov3_rs_Money[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: NEW SPOT FOR NPC's?
item.dc:creator: @lov3_rs_money lov3_rs_money
item.description:
@lov3_rs_money wrote:

yeah, go to the spot, type ::mypos, or look on player controls, then find the npcs id u want
then go to autospawn.cfg
then type
spawn = ####(npc id)TAB(X-Co-Ord)TAB(Y-Co-Ord)Tab0TAb0Tab0Tab0Tab0Tab(1/2)Tab(Name Of NPc)
Hope IT Helped!

lov3_rs_money

Read full topic
